description: This file is a PHP source file that generates a web page for editing managed services to block certain content. It includes server-side PHP logic, client-side JavaScript for form handling and validation, and HTML markup for the user interface, specifically for configuring blocked services with options for ports, time scheduling, and days.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a configuration string value for a given key, likely accessing device or system configuration.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Fetches extended key-value configuration data, used here to get managed services info.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Converts days and time data, probably for scheduling display or storage.
